lead_paragraph: Bradley, a former coach of the U.S. national soccer team, is teaching a new group of players on France’s north coast in the hopes that it will lead him to one of the top European leagues.

headline.print_headline: Climbing the Global Soccer Ladder With an Impediment: He’s American
headline.main: Bob Bradley Climbs the Global Soccer Ladder With an Impediment: He’s American

snippet: Bradley, a former coach of the U.S. national soccer team, is teaching a new group of players on France’s north coast in the hopes that it will lead him to one of the top European leagues.
abstract: Profile of Bob Bradley, American coach of second-tier French soccer team Havre A C; Bradley has coached national teams for United States and Egypt and hopes to prove himself worthy of job in top European division.
